checks.name: Data visualizer policy, chart primitives, and workflows exist
details: all required data visualizer files are present

checks.name: Chart containers expose accessibility semantics
details: SVG roles, labels, and metadata are present for chart containers

checks.name: Chart data points carry assistive labels

details: memoized chart transforms and reduced-motion handling are in place

checks.name: Color-blind-safe chart palette is centralized and reused
Transfer telemetry components expose visible and screen-reader status

checks.name: Data visualizer gate is wired in package scripts and workflows
